summary: Water quality parameters are outside optimal ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5. Consider adding pH buffers or adjusting feeding practices.
Reduce TDS levels to below 1000 ppm for optimal fish and plant health. Consider water changes or dilution.
Increase water temperature to around 24-28Â°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.
